Posts.EditableText: I have recently published a multiple choice game titled "World Adventure." I originally programmed it using Python 2.7, but I wanted it to be more easily accessible, so I decided to port it to Quest. It is currently under the uncategorized section, though I hope for it to be under the fantasy section, so if a moderator could categorize it for me, I would be greatly appreciative. I'm also hoping for anybody that reads this post to go and play the game and provide feedback, as I am eager to possibly improve the game and/or my storytelling skills. Please rate and provide feedback.
